show.title: The Disciple Can Descend the Mountain Now
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/DsH54R
show.description: A loyal disciple is sent to retrieve the legendary Kohinoor—but the journey is soaked in blood, betrayal, and inner conflict. When a sacred command clashes with a sibling's deception, he must choose between duty and identity. In this battle for legacy, one wrong move could cost him everything.
show.description_secondary: A loyal disciple is sent to retrieve the legendary Kohinoor—but the journey is soaked in blood, betrayal, and inner conflict. When a sacred command clashes with a sibling's deception, he must choose between duty and identity. In this battle for legacy, one wrong move could cost him everything.
